mlr3torch 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference
  • Changelog

    Graph Network

    nn_graph.Rd

    Represents a neural network using a Graph that usually costains mostly PipeOpModules.

    nn_graph(graph, shapes_in, output_map = graph$output$name, list_output = FALSE)

    Arguments

    graph

    (Graph)
    The Graph to wrap.

    shapes_in

    (named integer)
    Shape info of tensors that go into graph. Names must be graph$input$name, possibly in different order.

    output_map

    (character)
    Which of graph's outputs to use. Must be a subset of graph$output$name.

    list_output

    (logical(1))
    Whether output should be a list of tensors. If FALSE (default), then length(output_map) must be 1.

    Value

    nn_graph

    See also

    Other graph_network: mlr_pipeops_module, mlr_pipeops_torch, model_descriptor_to_learner(), model_descriptor_to_module(), model_descriptor_union()

    Examples

    graph = as_graph(po("module", module = nn_linear(10, 1)))
#> Error in cpp_torch_strided(): Lantern is not loaded. Please use `install_torch()` to install additional dependencies.
network = nn_graph(graph, list(module.input = c(NA, 1)))
#> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'graph' not found
network
#> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'network' not found
